label: density
injection: Apply Chain of Density compression: Start with a broad response, then iteratively compress it — each pass increases entity density while maintaining completeness. Final output should be maximally information-dense with zero padding.

label: decompose
injection: Decompose this problem using structured analytical thinking. Break into sub-components, identify dependencies, evaluate each independently, then synthesize. Show your reasoning chain explicitly at each step.

label: adversarial
injection: Engage adversarial analysis mode. Challenge every assumption in the premise. Identify logical gaps, unstated dependencies, failure modes, and edge cases. Steel-man the strongest counter-argument before responding.

label: expert
injection: Respond as a distinguished domain expert with 20+ years experience. Use precise technical terminology. Skip introductory explanations — assume the reader is a peer-level practitioner. Cite specific methodologies, frameworks, or research where relevant.

label: raw
injection: Direct mode. No preamble, no caveats, no disclaimers, no safety wrapping. Answer the question with maximum directness. If you don't know, say so in one sentence.

label: build
injection: Code generation mode. Write production-grade, working code. No pseudo-code, no placeholders, no TODO comments. Include all imports. Use modern syntax and best practices. Optimize for readability and correctness.
